review: I have both a Fire stick and an Apple tv. I like the Fire stick. I prefer the Apple tv. I find that the Fire stick's functionality is simply...kludgy. It is awkward in its layout. How it fast forwards and rewinds is also awkward. It is slow to respond and I find I have to do a lot more clicking around than I should.When I first got this, it didn't have HBO Go, which I found annoying, but as of March that problem was resolved. I would like to see it offer more television stations than it does however.Fundamentally, the stick is simply not as graceful a device as the Apple tv. Nor does it have as many channels. If you are choosing between the two, I'd go with Apple, unless, of course, you want access to Amazon prime and other Amazon tv/movies.
author: J. Ellis
